response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a detailed overview of the _codecs_iso2022 standard library module in Python 3.12+, discussing its purpose, key features, and usage.
key_points: Supports encoding and decoding ISO-2022 text data
_encodings.iso2022xx encoders are provided for each of the ISO-2022 character sets (e.g., _encodings.iso2022jp)
The module is useful for handling multilingual and mixed-encoding text files
Offers a high level of compatibility with other programming languages like C++, Java, and Perl that support ISO-2022
version_notes: _encodings.iso2022xx encoders have been available since Python 3.5
caveats: The _codecs_iso2022 module is not widely used due to the decline in popularity of ISO-2022 and the rise of other encoding standards like UTF-8
ISO-2022 character sets can be complex and confusing for developers unfamiliar with their specific conventions
